unnormalised: Urban planning in India requires a holistic approach, considering the unique challenges of our diverse cities. The Nehruvian vision, while foundational, needs re-evaluation in 2024. Effective implementation and public consultation (e.g., gram sabhas) are vital, ensuring policies serve citizens from 01/01/2025 at 10:00 hrs. Better data collection on land use, completed by 15/08/2024, is crucial for informed decisions.
